metadata.description: Specify the name of your existing OMS Automation account to store the configuration
Specify the region for your OMS workspace
Specify the name of your Automation Account
Specify region for your automation account
Name of the OMS Recovery Vault
The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated
GUID for the schedule creation - create a unique before deploy

OMSWorkspaceId.name: OMSWorkspaceId
OMSWorkspaceId.description: Workspace ID for the Log Analytics workspace

OMSWorkspaceKey.name: OMSWorkspaceKey
OMSWorkspaceKey.description: Primary key for the Log Analytics workspace

OMSAutomationAccountName.name: OMSAutomationAccountName
OMSAutomationAccountName.description: Name of the linked Automation account

OMSRecoveryVault.name: OMSRecoveryVault
OMSRecoveryVault.description: Name of the linked Recovery Vault

OMSResourceGroupName.name: OMSResourceGroupName
OMSResourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource Group containing the OMS services

vmManagement.name: azureMgmtAnalytics
vmManagement.description: OMS runbook to capture Azure Resources into OMS Log Analytics

alert1.description: A new virtual machines has been created.

Donut.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:IaaS | measure countdistinct (VMName_s) by MgmtStatus_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:IaaS MgmtStatus_s:Unmanaged | measure countdistinct (MgmtStatus_s) by VMName_s, ResourceGroupName_s | select VMName_s, ResourceGroupName_s

Donut.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:PaaS | measure countdistinct (ResourceName_s) by MgmtStatus_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:PaaS MgmtStatus_s:Unmanaged | measure count () by ResourceName_s, ResourceType | Select ResourceName_s, ResourceType | select ResourceName_s, ResourceType

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:DSC | measure countdistinct (VMName_s) by VMName_s

SecondTile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:DSC | measure countdistinct (AutomationAccountName_s) by AutomationAccountName_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:DSC MgmtStatus_s:Managed | measure countdistinct (VMName_s) by VMName_s, NodeConfigurationName_s, Status_s | Select VMName_s, NodeConfigurationName_s, Status_s

Donut.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Backup | measure countdistinct (VMName_s) by ProtectionStatus_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL ProtectionStatus_s:Unprotected Log_s:Backup | measure countdistinct (VMName_s) by VMName_s | select VMName_s

Donut.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL AND (Log_s=IaaS OR Log_s:Storage)  | measure countdistinct (ResourceId) by AvailabilityStatus_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL AND (Log_s=IaaS OR Log_s:Storage) AvailabilityStatus_s:"Not Highly Available" | measure count () by ResourceId, ResourceGroupName_s, AvailabilityStatus_s | select ResourceId, ResourceGroupName_s, AvailabilityStatus_s

Donut.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments | measure countdistinct (CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments AND (ProvisioningState_s:Failed OR ProvisioningState_s:Canceled) | measure count () by DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s | select DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (ResourceId) by ResourceName_s

SecondTile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure count () by ResourceType

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (ResourceId) by ResourceType

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:RBAC | measure countdistinct (RoleDefinitionId_g) by DisplayName_s

SecondTile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:RBAC !Scope_s:"/subscriptions/09e8ed26-7d8b-4678-a179-cfca8a0cef5c" | measure countdistinct (RoleDefinitionId_g) by DisplayName_s, Scope_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:RBAC !Scope_s:"/subscriptions/09e8ed26-7d8b-4678-a179-cfca8a0cef5c" | measure countdistinct (RoleDefinitionId_g) by DisplayName_s, Scope_s | select DisplayName_s, Scope_s

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Policy | measure countdistinct(ResourceId) by Name_s, Properties_scope_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Policy | measure countdistinct(ResourceId) by Name_s, Properties_scope_s | Select Name_s, Properties_scope_s

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Lock | measure countdistinct (LockId_s) by ResourceType, ResourceName_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Lock | measure countdistinct (LockId_s) by ResourceName_s, ResourceType | Select ResourceName_s, ResourceType

Tile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (SubscriptionId) by SubscriptionId

SecondTile.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (Location_s) by Location_s

List.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (ResourceId) by Location_s, SubscriptionId

TileOne.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL MgmtStatus_s:Unmanaged | measure count () by ResourceName_s

TileTwo.Query: Type:AzureManagement_CL TimeGenerated>NOW-1HOUR MgmtStatus_s:Unmanaged Log_s:IaaS | measure count () by VMName_s
